heading: HB01395
0: AN ACT PROHIBITING GOVERNMENT ENTITIES INCLUDING GOVERNMENT-OWNED OR CONTROLLED CORPORATIONS AND THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS, TO ALLOCATE FUNDS FOR THE ADDITIONAL COMPENSATION, ALLOWANCES, HONORARIA, BONUSES OR OTHER EMOLUMENTS TO THE OFFICIALS AND PERSONNEL OF THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) STATIONED IN OR ASSIGNED IN THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICES THEREBY STRENGTHENING THE INDEPENDENCE, MORALITY AND INTEGRITY OF THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01395
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING GOVERNMENT ENTITIES INCLUDING GOVERNMENT-OWNED OR CONTROLLED CORPORATIONS AND THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS, TO ALLOCATE FUNDS FOR THE ADDITIONAL COMPENSATION, ALLOWANCES, HONORARIA, BONUSES OR OTHER EMOLUMENTS TO THE OFFICIALS AND PERSONNEL OF THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) STATIONED IN OR ASSIGNED IN THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICES THEREBY STRENGTHENING THE INDEPENDENCE, MORALITY AND INTEGRITY OF THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
